title: A Great white bird
creator_credit: Michael McKennirey, Desmond Dew, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film documents the efforts of a group of people in Canada and the United States to sav the whooping crane from extinction. They display great determination and resourcefulness in their dealings with this mysterious, fiercely independent pre-Ice Age creature.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael McKennirey, Desmond Dew, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
description: This film documents the efforts of a group of people in Canada and the United States to sav the whooping crane from extinction. They display great determination and resourcefulness in their dealings with this mysterious, fiercely independent pre-Ice Age creature.
